title: StoryConfig
description: An instance of the story configuration.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the story or its i18n key.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: The slug of the story or its i18n key.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the story or its i18n key.
description.example: This is a super story about awesome things

default.title: Default loading scene
default.description: The UID of the default scene to load on start.

thumbnails.title: Thumbnails
thumbnails.description: The list of thumbnails in the story. Each member is an instance of a thumbnail.

scenes.title: Scenes
scenes.description: The list of scenes in the story. Each member is an instance of a scene.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: The list of groups in the story. Each member is an instance of a group.
